title: unutilized FSI of any structure or precinct which is declared as Heritage structure or precinct unde
clause_text: unutilized FSI of any structure or precinct which is declared as Heritage structure or precinct under the provisions of Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations, due to restrictions imposed in that regulation;
section: Cases eligible for Transferable Development Rights (TDR)
